... me: "can I give you my number in case you find the bags?" .. agent: "umm...yeah... sure... let me write that down in case we find them"
...agent: "what color are your bags?" ... me: "black" .. agent: "uh oh" (which I also took as a bad sign)... followed by a long pause...
...she said she'd make a note of our bags so @AmericanAir could keep an eye out for them and call us if they found them...
... she explained there were a million bags all mixed up in O'Hare and ours were somewhere in them...or maybe in Seattle...or somewhere else
When I asked the @AmericanAir agent on Tuesday if there was any chance of getting our bags back she... giggled...which i took as a bad sign
Watching the kids while my wife runs to a local mall to buy us some clothes - we concluded 4 days in same pair of clothes is too much :)
